name: Anchor
description: Like a button but not really

name: Article
description: Preview of a text + image type of content. Works great in an ecos-collection

name: Badge
description: A nice little tag to place next to your content to give it some identity

name: Breadcrumb
description: To aid with navigation

name: Button
description: You probably knows what a button is

name: Button 3D
description: A fun button with cool interactivity

name: Card
description: A visual surface to group information

name: Collection
description: Display a list of content around something like a responsive grid

name: Colorize
description: Smartly colorize some content using your browser blend-mode

name: Content
description: Add padding around the slotted content so that its nicely displayed on a surface such as a card

name: Dialog
description: Dialog component

name: Form
description: Form and form-row aid for displaying nice looking forms

name: Icon
description: The icon component is an SVG wrapper to display all sorts of icons

name: Navbar
description: Components to present a responsive navbar

name: Next
description: Create related screens that navigates left/right as you go deeper. Similar to settings screens on mobile apps

name: Section
description: Use this component to create a section of content in a page

name: Select
description: Web-component implementation of an HTML select element

name: Slider
description: Input component to select a numeric value

name: Stack
description: A flow container to handle nice margin between blocks

name: Table
description: Display data in a table fashion. Uses also table-row and table-item

name: Text Field
description: Web-component implementation of an HTML input element

name: Two
description: Use this component to display two blocks next to each other in a responsive way
